field.name: summary
field.value: Proposed change in fluent registration API for interceptors

field.name: description
field.value:
As by thread http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_thread/thread/b319dcd50b192bc7, here's a patch to provide a shortcut to register interceptors directly by key, type and generic type.
Tests included. One test is ignored because it depends on issue http://support.castleproject.org/projects/CORE/issues/view/CORE-ISSUE-26 to be included in the Core binary referenced by MK.
The current API remains, but in the new one I removed the ability to specify order for interceptors, they are simply registered in the order in which they are supplied.
I'm following the discussion on the mailing list for any questions.
